description: Ensure that when a user with ADMIN or SUPER_ADMIN role logs in, they can see and access admin management links in the navigation menu. Implementation: 1) Check menu-admin-panel-link feature implementation, 2) Verify useUserRole hook correctly identifies admin users from user_roles array, 3) Ensure menu configuration checks for admin role presence: user.user_roles.some(r => r.name === 'ADMIN' || r.name === 'SUPER_ADMIN'), 4) Test login with admin@refine.dev seed user (should have ADMIN role), 5) Verify Admin Panel link appears in navigation menu, 6) Verify /admin route is accessible, 7) Add E2E test verifying admin user sees admin links, 8) Test with non-admin user to ensure links are hidden. Fix any issues with role detection logic.
